reference: Medicare Signed into law in 1965. Provides health coverage for the elderly and disabled.
In 2001 40.1 million persons were covered of whom 34.4 million were elderly and 5.7 million disabled. Expenditures in 2001 totaled $241 billion or $6,199 per enrollee.
In 2002, 33,410,000 people were enrolled in Part A and 32,000,000 in part B. So the implied takeup of Part B is 96%.
